profile:
Here are the list of available commands relating to [profile] 

!stl : Set Twitch link. Usage: !stl (link) 

!syl : Set Youtube link. Usage: !syl (link) 

!ssl : Set Steam link. Usage : !ssl (link) 

!setlinks : Set all links in one message. Usage : !setlinks (Twitch) (Youtube) (Steam) 

!profile : View your profile! 

!top: Check top 10 in the server. 

!convert [value] [type1] [type2] : Converts from one value to another. For more info, type !help convert. 

!contype [type or measure] : See available units for conversion for the specified type or measure.
top:
!top [argument] [argument] 
Available arguments: Date, Page 
Date: MMM\_YYYY. Example: dec\_2017 or feb\_2016 
Page: Page number.
Arguments need not be in order.
It is not necessary to specify both arguments.
convert:
Converts from one unit to another. Available measures (eg mass) are: 
[Length] [Area] [Mass] [Volume] [Volume Flow Rate] [Temperature] [Time] [Speed] [Pressure] [Digital] [Parts-Per] [Energy]
To see the available conversions, please type !contype [unit or measure].
To convert, type !convert [value] [original unit] [new unit]. Eg: !convert 10 kg lb
request: !accept [messageID] || How to use: See a request that you want to / will work on in the future? Right click the message containing the request, select "Copy ID". Now send !accept [the copied ID] and the bot will move it to the dedicated channel for you. Multiple messages can be accepted in the same message.

!complete [ID] || How to use: Upon accepting a request, you will see a ID number in the footer of the embed. Use this ID to specify which requests you want to complete. Multiple requests can be specified in the same message.
!clear || How to use: Clears all your requests. Warning: This action is IRREVERSIBLE!!
translate: Description: Translate from one language to another using Yandex.
!translate [Language to translate from] [Language to translate to] [Sentence to translate]
If the language to translate from is not specified, it defaults to English.
